name: freddy
description: Freddy - A fast mobile Reddit reader
author: spacejack

scripts.build-ts: browserify src/ts/main.ts -p [ tsify --project src/ts/tsconfig.json ] | uglifyjs -cm -o public/js/freddy.js
scripts.compile-pcss: postcss src/pcss/index.pcss --use postcss-import postcss-simple-vars postcss-nesting autoprefixer -o public/css/freddy.css
scripts.watch-pcss: postcss src/pcss/index.pcss --watch --use postcss-import postcss-simple-vars postcss-nesting autoprefixer -o public/css/freddy.css
scripts.build-pcss: postcss src/pcss/index.pcss --no-map --use postcss-import postcss-simple-vars postcss-nesting autoprefixer postcss-clean -o public/css/freddy.css
scripts.clean: rm -f public/js/freddy.js public/css/freddy.css dist/index.html && rmdir dist
scripts.serve: budo src/ts/main.ts:js/freddy.js -p 3000 --dir public --live=*.{html,css} -- --debug -p [ browserify-hmr ] -p [ tsify --project src/ts/tsconfig.json ]
